name: Cracking Europa
description:
Year 2111. After earth broke a generation ago, humanity struggles for survival in one last autonomous colony orbiting around Jupiter. Dissolved in the ice moon Europa's salty undergrund oceans and trapped by cryovulcano glaciers lie rare and direly needed metals. Soon, you must return home, due to radiation. Before your time is up, how much metal will you mine by laser smelting and electrolysis?

Day and Night - original Jupiter ambient ASMR in 3D dolby surround, synchronized with orbits!

Bad Ressource: Jupiter's radiation field induces laser recharge bar - Balancing WIP.

Everything is broken: Compelling postapocalyptic story background - Feature adventure events WIP.

Water levels are rising: Feature electrolysis ground stations WIP.

High Concept, core game mechanics for spawns and laser, as well as assets Jupiter and Europa were built since easter saturday. During THM iisterjam, we milestoned the assets Laser Station, sounds, directing und scripting and additional features matching the jam themes.
